content.heading: Portfolio
content.description: My portfolio is a static website crafted to showcase my skills, projects, and expertise.

content.heading: Covered
content.description: Covered, an application focused on empowering users to manage profiles and generate personalized job application content.

content.heading: Court Mapper
content.description: CourtMapper uses Python, Selenium, and a MongoDB Atlas serverless instance to monitor tennis court availability.

content.heading: Sentiment Analysis
content.description: An automated process to compute the sentiment of Central Bank text (statements, minutes, speeches) and a value of distribution (to measure uncertainty).

content.heading: Ai Tastic Tales
content.description: AI-Tastic Tales, an innovative program harnessing the capabilities of the ChatGPT and Stable Diffusion APIs.

content.heading: Brolli
content.description: The Brolli project is an Arduino program designed for an ESP8266 module, to provide a visual indication of hourly precipitation probability

content.heading: iPrunes Aquaponics System
content.description: iPrunes, an indoor aquaponic garden. Designed as a fruitful unit that's compact, adaptable and aesthetic.

content.heading: Shopper Restoration
content.description: Reviving and electrifying a classic Raleigh Shopper with a seamless restoration and the addition of a 1000W rear hub for an electric boost.
